works.description:
It's the Copa America 2011 Schedule.

The schedule is copied exactly as it appears on my website and what gives it away are the sub-links I have used a.k.a #top #bottom etc. Therefore they point to different sections of the same article, moving the viewer either on top of the page or the bottom.

However the person who has stolen my work hasn't changed those, and they still link towards my website, which gives them away. On top of that they do not have any contact form.... how convenient.
